Name: Agastya Bellad
About:
Agastya likes working in a fast moving, energetic, and creative environment. Prior to founding Beltech, he worked at INDwealth as an 'Entrepreneur in Residence' with Ashish Kashyap. Agastya is currently also working as an acting CEO at the Bellad Group of Companies, managing over 25 branches and 600 people.
Apart from being a workoholic, Agastya loves boxing, squash, and hockey. He also enjoys the occasional hike.

Name: Pinakee Biswas
About:
Pinakee has 20+ years of experience in IT/Telecom where he has led large engineering teams, and has conceptualised and built advanced, complex, large scale, distributed, high performing systems in Ecommerce/Retail, Internet, Digital Media, Telecommunication and Networking. Pinakee heads technology at Quikr and also has co-founded an Ecommerce company where the technology platform has been his brainchild. 
Apart from building technology, Pinakee loves spending time with family, loves to paint, is an avid reader, a health freak, a musician, and loves to play the drums.

Name: Dr. Sathisha Basavaraju
About: Sathish is a researcher with more than four years of R&D experience in the domain of computer vision and artificial intelligence. He believes that findings from cognitive science and neurobiology can greatly help in building robust computer vision systems. Apart from R&D,  he likes reading, teaching, playing badminton, swimming, and spending time with family and friends.

Name: Arpitha Marganalli
About:
Arpitha is a specialist in Hybrid Mobile Developement, using Ionic, React Native and Angular frameworks. She is a BE graduate from VTU university.

With 3 years of professional experience and her interest in development, she has developed more than 6 applications that are user friendly and professionally accurate_to the system.

Name: Shithanshu Mishra
About: Shithanshu is a backend engineer with 1.5 years of experience in designing backend systems & micro-services. He has a curious mind and is fond of learning about systems, architectures & technologies that drive them. He has a keen interest in electronics and robotics. In his leisure time, he loves playing chess and follows cricket.
School: D.Y Patil College of Engineering, Pune

About: Yukta is quite passionate about philanthropical work and like the company is also dedicated to improving the city infrastructure, thus making lives better. Apart from this, she likes exploring different places and experiencing different cultures.
